                                 java.lang.String onsElement)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
ONS lookup function

Parameters:
onsUri - IP address or hostname of ONS to query. Call will use DNS (UDP port 53)
onsElement - formatted as xxxxx.xxxx.sgtin.id.onsepc.com
Returns:
table of elements as Strings
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

querySingle

public java.lang.String querySingle(java.lang.String onsUri,
                                    java.lang.String queryType,
                                    java.lang.String onsElement,
                                    java.lang.String proxyType,
                                    java.lang.String proxyUri,
                                    java.lang.String proxyPort)
                             throws java.lang.Exception

ONS query function with proxy parameters.

Supports HTTP or SOCKS proxies.
Sample call: 

  ONSClient onsQuery = new ONSClient();
  try {
     String result = onsQuery.querySingle("194.199.139.61", "NAPTR", "ons1.333.sgtin.id.onsepc1.eu",
             "SOCKS", "freeway.rd.francetelecom.fr", "");
     //String result = onsQuery.querySingle("194.199.139.61", "NAPTR", "ons1.333.sgtin.id.onsepc1.eu",
     //        "HTTP", "p-goodway.rd.francetelecom.fr", "3128");
     System.out.println(result);
  } catch (Exception e) {
     System.out.println("Failed: " + e);
  }

Parameters:
onsUri - IP address or hostname of ONS to query. Call will use DNS (UDP port 53)
queryType - "NAPTR" or ""
onsElement - formatted as xxxxx.xxxx.sgtin.id.onsepc.com
proxyType - "HTTP", "SOCKS"
proxyUri - proxy's IP address or hostname
proxyPort - proxy's port (default is 8080 for HTTP and 1080 for socks)
Returns:
elements as single String
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

addNaptrRecord

public org.xbill.DNS.Message addNaptrRecord(java.lang.String onsUri,
                                            java.lang.String onsZone,
                                            java.lang.String onsElement,
                                            int order,
                                            int preference,
                                            java.lang.String service,
                                            java.lang.String serviceEntry)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
Add a new NAPTR entry in zone, such as IN NAPTR 0802072 IN NAPTR 0 0 "u" "EPC+epcis" !^.*$!http://213.56.130.68:8081/malongo-pilot-epcis/query! . 0802072 IN NAPTR 1 0 "u" "EPC+html" !^.*$!http://boutique.malongo.com/swf/index.html! .

Parameters:
onsUri - ONS address, e.g. 213.56.130.68
onsZone - zone, e.g. 318757.sgtin.id.onsepc1.eu
onsElement - e.g. 0802072
order - e.g. 0 for first
preference - e.g. 0 for first
service - e.g. EPC+html
serviceEntry - e.g. http://boutique.malongo.com/swf/index.html
Returns:
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

onsZone - zone, e.g. 318757.sgtin.id.onsepc1.eu

order - e.g. 0 for first
preference - e.g. 0 for first
